title: Nmap Discovery Mystery
description: Use nmap to uncover services and potential vulnerabilities on a closed network segment.
hints: Start with a simple nmap scan: nmap 10.10.10.10
Look for services running on ports other than the default ones.
Analyze service banners for potential misconfigurations.
learningObjectives: Understand basic network scanning with nmap
Identify open ports and services on a network
Analyze scan results for potential vulnerabilities
